project_intro.title: Remoto
project_intro.description: Remoto is a Remote assist application integrated as a part of the UEM software which allows the IT administrators to effortlessly view, control and troubleshoot devices decreasing downtime and enhancing productivity.

details.title: Context
details.description: Remote Assist and Control Applications enable IT teams to troubleshoot, manage, and support devices from any location, ensuring quick resolution of technical issues, enhancing security, and improving efficiency for distributed workforces. These tools are essential for maintaining seamless IT operations in remote and hybrid work environments.

refreshed_designs.title: Refreshed Designs
refreshed_designs.final_outcome: These enhancements have transformed the UEM forums into a more vibrant and interactive platform, fostering greater user participation and collaboration. The addition of gamification elements like badges and leaderboards, combined with organized discussions, ideation spaces, groups, and tags, has significantly improved the user experience and engagement within the community.

designs.title: Improved onboarding Experience
designs.description: Improved the onboarding flow by nudging the users to select the required permission and better illustrations for representation.

designs.title: Parameters
designs.description: Displaying important parameters which are very much responsible for the smooth functioning of the application which assists the users & admins to keep track of the usages

designs.title: Enhanced selection methods
designs.description: Improved the permissions access & Control settings by changing the functionality by switching to toggles and dropdowns for more upfront details.

designs.title: New Notification Drawer
designs.description: Improved the permissions access & Control settings by changing the functionality by switching to toggles and dropdowns for more upfront details.

designs.title: Increased Engagement
designs.description: Increased the Interaction between the users and admin to keep track of all the important updates, notifications and a message section to get in touch with the admin incase of any trouble

designs.title: Essential Settings
designs.description: Introduced few essential settings which can contribute for the efficient working of the application at all scenarios.

next_case_study.title: Enduroom Design system
next_case_study.description: Carefully curated design system to maintain the consistency across all platforms and devices.
